vibedoc.description: VibeDoc MCP Server - 本地Windows环境配置 ✅已验证

setup_instructions_local.step1: 确保已安装 Node.js 18+ 和 npm
setup_instructions_local.step2: 在项目根目录运行: npm install && npm run mcp:build
setup_instructions_local.step3: 确保 run-mcp.bat 文件存在且可执行
setup_instructions_local.step4: 将你的Silicon Flow API密钥替换 sk-your-api-key-here
setup_instructions_local.step5: 将项目路径 D:\VibeCoding_pgm\VibeDocs_MCP 替换为你的实际路径
setup_instructions_local.step6: 将此配置添加到 Claude Desktop 配置文件
setup_instructions_local.step7: 重启 Claude Desktop，查看输出: VibeDoc MCP Server running on stdio

verified_working_solution.note: 此配置已在Windows环境下完整验证，解决了中文路径编码问题
key_features: 绝对路径配置避免路径解析问题
直接node执行绕过npm命令行问题
暂停功能便于查看运行状态

args: chcp 65001; cd '项目路径'; $env:SILICONFLOW_API_KEY='sk-your-api-key-here'; node dist/src/index.js
